parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The API description. The description can be up to 200 characters in length.

parameters.name: Method
parameters.description: The request HTTP method of the API.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: Path
parameters.description: The request path of the API.
